column5: Looking to get ahead in the financial sector? Our MSc will keep you up-to-date with contemporary accounting and finance skills, and firm up your understanding of traditional methods too – equipping you for the best chance of success in the competitive world of finance and accounting.Our MSc has been designed to build and improve your knowledge in the field of accounting and finance. You'll cover both the core disciplines and traditional and contemporary theory, giving you a springboard of skills to launch yourself into the financial sector.
column7: For the course starting on 26 September 2022 the tuition fees are: UK / Channel Islands - £8,245 per course International - £15,000 per course  If you would like to know more about the fees listed, please get in touch with our Enquiries Team.
